title: Nvidia introduces new Generative AI capabilities for Windows based RTX PCs at Computex
description: Nvidia claims that RTX GPUs "which offer up to 1,400 Tensor TFLOPS for AI inferencing and generative AI models can run up to 5x faster than on competing devices", thanks to the Tensor Cores, Nvidia's dedicated hardware for AI calculations.
